    Description
    Eip712Domain
    EIP-712 domain separator fields.
    Eip712Domain.Builder
    Builder for constructing Eip712Domain instances.
    Eip712Type
    Sealed interface representing all valid EIP-712 types.
    Eip712Type.Address
    Ethereum address type (20 bytes).
    Eip712Type.Array
    Array type with optional fixed length.
    Eip712Type.Bool
    Boolean type.
    Eip712Type.DynamicBytes
    Dynamic-length byte array type (bytes).
    Eip712Type.FixedBytes
    Fixed-length byte array type (bytes1, bytes2, ..., bytes32).
    Eip712Type.Int
    Signed integer type (int8, int16, ..., int256).
    Eip712Type.String
    Dynamic-length string type.
    Eip712Type.Struct
    Struct (custom composite) type.
    Eip712Type.Uint
    Unsigned integer type (uint8, uint16, ..., uint256).
    TypedData<T>
    Type-safe EIP-712 typed data container.
    TypedDataField
    A single field in a struct type definition.
    TypedDataJson
    JSON parsing support for EIP-712 typed data.
    TypedDataPayload
    Raw typed data payload parsed from JSON.
    TypedDataSigner
    Static utility for EIP-712 typed data signing.
    TypeDefinition<T>
    Defines the EIP-712 type structure for a Java type.
